explanation:
code_hardening: Added defensive reflection-based resolution for Ethernet and WiMAX type constants to safely handle API-level availability and included a default-safe return for unknown types.
resolve_compilation_errors: Used fully qualified names and reflection (android.net.ConnectivityManager.TYPE_ETHERNET / TYPE_WIMAX via Field lookup) to avoid compile-time issues when constants may not exist.
exception_handling: Wrapped reflective constant access in try/catch blocks and safely ignored failures, defaulting to non-fast behavior.
logic_customization: Extended the top-level network type check to treat Ethernet and WiMAX as fast connections while leaving all mobile subtype speed classifications unchanged and preserving existing behavior for other types.
refactoring: Grouped fast non-mobile network checks into a single conditional before the mobile subtype switch to improve readability without altering logic.
misc: Updated inline comments to reflect Ethernet and WiMAX being considered fast connections; no new custom API calls beyond reflection were introduced.
